name: 2nd International Conference on Occupational Health & Public Safety
content: Frigate Conferences takes immense pleasure & feels honored in inviting contributors from across the globe to the "2nd International Conference on Occupational Health & Public Safety’’ to be held during April 22-24, 2025 in Paris, France, on the theme " Workplace Health & Safety: Excellence in Research and Innovation''. Occupational Health 2025 will include prompt Keynote Presentations, Oral Presentations, Poster Presentations, Young Research Forum, Workshops, and Exhibitions.
